name: Crocotile 3D Scene
summary: Learn about .CROCOTILE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Game developers, hobbyists, and designers use Crocotile 3D to build 3D worlds with a simple, grid-based approach. They typically encounter CROCOTILE files when creating new levels or scenes within Crocotile 3D.

They save their work, share scenes with collaborators, or archive projects as CROCOTILE files for later use. Crocotile 3D also allows users to export a CROCOTILE scene for use in games or other projects.

description: A CROCOTILE file is a scene created by Crocotile 3D, an application for creating and editing 3D environments using a tile-based system. It stores the layout of tiles, objects, textures, and camera settings that comprise a 3D scene in the JSON standard. CROCOTILE files may also include lighting information, object properties, and layer organization for the scene.

instructions: You can open CROCOTILE files with Crocotile 3D. To open a CROCOTILE file, select File â†’ Load Scene.

Since CROCOTILE files contain plain text information, you can also open them with a text editor. However, opening them with a text editor will not appear the same as if opening them with Crocotile 3D.
Crocotile 3D can convert CROCOTILE files to various file types, including the following formats:
